attributes.additional_details:
I believe that Surrogacy laws need to be changed !!
The birth mother should NOT be the legal mother.
The legal mother should be the BIOLOGICAL mother.
I also believe that The minority of women who suffer from the rare condition MRKH should have more chances at i.v.f on the NHS and be financially supported by the NHS through surrogacy.
The NHS is happy to pay for people who already have children to have more. For people born male to become female and so on. We were born with OUT our ORGANS and have been left to suffer silently since.
